pr_title: Fix bug that would cause pdl encoder to import types conflicting with inline types.

timeline.message:
Fix bug that would cause pdl encoder to import types conflicting with
inline types.
Also improves how imports for includes are handled.

timeline.author: evanw555

timeline.bodyText: We should clarify that this set is a collection of simple names, not full names.
timeline.author: evanw555
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -756,7 +756,7 @@ private void writeDocAndProperties(RecordDataSchema.Field field) throws IOExcept
    * @param inlinedTypes cumulative set of all inlined types in this schema (and its descendents).
